title: We Open Up About How We Handle Studio Tension Off-Air
description:
We know there are a TON of questions our listeners have for us. So on social media, we asked you to send in your questions. And today, we're taking the time to answer them. But we're a little worried about what type of questions we'll receive.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
